data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Matt Smith scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 35, Shaun Williams with an assist there.
Graham Scott blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 57, Scott Malone (Millwall) has replaced the possibly injured Mason Bennett.
Neil Harris is making the team's first substitution at The Den with Sheyi Ojo replacing Junior Hoilett.
Millwall's Ryan Woods has been booked in London.
In the minute 75, The away team have replaced Robert Glatzel with Josh Murphy. This is the second substitution made today by Neil Harris.
Jon Dadi Bödvarsson is replacing Ben Thompson for the home team.
The home team replace Matt Smith with Troy Parrott.
In the minute 79, Kieffer Moore gets an equalizer for Cardiff. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Josh Murphy to set up the goal.
At The Den, Shaun Williams has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Jon Dadi Bödvarsson (Millwall) gets a yellow card.
